resources.string: Camera has been disabled because of security policies.
There was a problem saving your photo or video.
The app does not have critical permissions needed to run. Please check your permissions settings.
Insert an SD card before using the camera.
The app couldn\'t connect to the camera
Photo or video did not save to the device.
External memory space is insufficient. Change the storage setting or delete some images or other files.
U disk memory space is insufficient. Change the storage setting or delete some images or other files.
Internal memory space is insufficient. Change the storage setting or delete some images or other files.
Internal memory space is insufficient. Delete some images or other files
Tag your photos and videos with the locations where they\'re taken.
In Settings, change resolution and quality, or try advanced features.
You can change this later in Settings.
The image can not be saved,please shoot again.
SD card is removed,no recording file is saved.
USB is removed,no recording file is saved.
Close video floating windows when open camera.
Take picture when covering back-auxiliary-camera for 1 second
Quick capture by double-click vol down key when screen off
Quick capture by double-click cam key when screen off
Slow motion function is on, can not change zoom value.
Current module function is on, can not change zoom value.
You can record after taking picture.
Currently can take pictures, but can not be recorded.
Battery level is low, flash can not be used.
Please don\'t block the lens to ensure the picture effect!
The current scene is not suitable for refocus processing!
Current storage supports 4GB recording at the most
Cannot record video during ongoing call.
Cannot take audio picture during ongoing call.
Recording won\'t start due to audio resource is occupied.
Another application is using a microphone, so video will not has audio.
Please hold the device vertically to shoot
Audio resource is occupied,currently can take pictures,but can not be recorded.
Please keep the object within two meters of the tablet.
This can achieve the effect of bokeh.
Only taking pic of portrait has the effect of depth of field.
AI detect open, can not lock AE/AF
Please allow the access or clear app storage and try again.
The rear camera is not installed or damaged, and has been switched to the front camera.
The main camera is not installed or damaged, and has been switched to the sub-camera.
Identify multiple scenes and optimize shots
Identify portrait scenes and optimize shots
Temporarily not authorized storage location permissions .Please use this function after unlocking your tablet.
Authorize storage device permissions as below
The time of capture is too short.
